biocontainers.name: a5-miseq
biocontainers.summary: A5-miseq is a pipeline for assembling dna sequence data generated on the illumina sequencing platform. this readme will take you through the steps necessary for running

biotools.summary: De novo assembly & analysis of Illumina sequence data, including the A5 pipeline, A5-miseq, tools to evaluate assembly quality, and scripts to facilitate data submission to NCBI and the RAST annotation system
